name: Berdeu Artiom
whatIsMyConnectionToJavascript: My connection to JavaScript is essential as I use it to develop a platform based on Kubernetes (k8s). Through JavaScript, I implement third-party services and leverage the Node.js client to seamlessly integrate and interact with these services within the platform.
whatCanIContribute: As someone working on the development platform, I have the opportunity to contribute by sharing my expertise with individuals who are interested in.
